paramInformation.label: Auto Report State Time
paramInformation.description: 0 means turn off auto report state. units of 30 minutes

metadata.inclusion: Press the tamper key three times within 3 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the tamper key three times within 3 seconds.
metadata.reset:
1. Press the button three times in three seconds
2. The LED will flash slowly for one second
3. Press and hold the button until the LED lights up
4. After about three seconds, the LED will turn off
5. Release the button within two seconds
If successful, the LED will flash once per second.
